education.degree: 3-years master degree in Computer Science & Electronic Engineering
education.description: Polytech SORBONNE, The speciality trains engineers specialising in electronic-computer systems (embedded, connected objects, intelligent systems, etc.) through apprenticeship. The pedagogy is based on the realisation of concrete applications through academic projects (a quarter of the hourly volume) and missions carried out in companies. These become more complex as the apprentice progresses and becomes more autonomous.

education.degree: 2-years technical University degree in Network and Telecommunications
education.description: IUT Nancy-BRABOIS, I learned how to install, maintain and administer corporate computer networks, how to deploy telecom infrastructures of telephone operators and Internet Service Providers, Optical fiber, 4G/5G, WIFI, Internet, Cloud, Cybersecurity, Datacenter.

IMIL, Luanda-ANGOLA, Three years of studies in electronics and telecommunications in which I learned fundamental knowledge of this profession and prepared me for further studies in the major technological universities.

testimonials.text: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it --then I can achieve it.
Seek to perform your duties to your highest ability, this way your actions will be blameless.
